message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. With its exceptional features and capabilities, it's truly a game-changer in its field. Given its value to you, I believe we can come to an agreement that benefits both of us. I am offering the product to you for $10,000. This price reflects the quality, functionality, and the significant savings compared to the market rate. I look forward to your positive response.
